item.name: Export the Http Action Plan List

request.description: This command requires no further arguments.
Provide an adql query (-q), a start time (-s) and an end time (-e) as parameters. Remember to escape double quotes in the query.

item.name: Disable an app agent by id

request.description: Provide an agent id (-i) and the disableMonitoring (-m) flag (true/false) as parameter.

item.name: Enable an app agent by id

request.description: Provide an agent id (-i) as parameter.

item.name: Get more details on agents of a specific type by providing their ids

request.description: Provide a type as parameter (-t) and a comma separated list of ids (-i). Possible types are appserver, machine, cluster.

item.name: List all agents of a specific type

request.description: Provide a type as parameter (-t). Possible types are appserver, machine, cluster.
